title: Watch Faces by Hyperflow
summary: A collection of 5 minimal yet bold watch faces for Android Wear.
description: Bold. Minimal. Modern.A collection of 5 minimal yet bold watch faces for Android Wear. This collection features unique watch faces purposefully designed for glanceability. Developed for both form and function these faces place a strong emphasis on minimalism. Each watch face contains multiple accent colors and features for added personalization.Watch Face Collection Includes: NOVAA bold digital watch face with subtle second hand animation. PULSEA sleek watch face featuring time as text, as well as the current date.SPHEREAn abstract take on time. Designed to be both unique and stylish. CHRONOA minimal analog watch face, featuring the current date. Designed for both round and square Android Wear watches.ULTRAA minimal analog watch face with fun customization options. Complications include watch battery %, current date and second digital time. Designed for both round and square Android Wear watches.Features:- 5 unique watch faces for one price- Minimal design for added glanceability- 16 unique color choices for added personalization- Complications include watch battery %, current date, digital time- Subtle yet smooth animation - All faces display well on both round and square watches- Chrono and Ultra feature custom round and square versions
descriptionHTML:
Bold. Minimal. Modern.

A collection of 5 minimal yet bold watch faces for Android Wear. This collection features unique watch faces purposefully designed for glanceability. Developed for both form and function these faces place a strong emphasis on minimalism. Each watch face contains multiple accent colors and features for added personalization.

Watch Face Collection Includes:

NOVA
A bold digital watch face with subtle second hand animation.

PULSE
A sleek watch face featuring time as text, as well as the current date.

SPHERE
An abstract take on time. Designed to be both unique and stylish.

CHRONO
A minimal analog watch face, featuring the current date. Designed for both round and square Android Wear watches.

ULTRA
A minimal analog watch face with fun customization options. Complications include watch battery %, current date and second digital time. Designed for both round and square Android Wear watches.


Features:
- 5 unique watch faces for one price
- Minimal design for added glanceability
- 16 unique color choices for added personalization
- Complications include watch battery %, current date, digital time
- Subtle yet smooth animation
- All faces display well on both round and square watches
- Chrono and Ultra feature custom round and square versions
comments: Great faces, don't quite fit the Zenwatch 3 perfectly or have a ton of settings so that's why it's only 4 stars. Either way great looking faces, keep up the great work!

Perfection, we want more! I like these because of its minimalistic nature. They're simple, not overcrowded with information, but just the ones I need (I do wish I had an option to change the type of info that's displayed). Further more, the dark background fit my AMOLED display, which in turn saves the battery life of my watch.

Good choice of faces No really great color options but what is there works decently well. If these were broken out into their own package it would be so much better as I only like 2 of the 5 there are.
Great minimalist watch faces! My only complain is that it doesn't fill up the display and makes my watch display look smaller than it actually is.
App looks great, but isn't compatible with the 3rd Gen Fossil Q Explorist. Will update review if this changes in the future.
It neither shows up in the dials of my Moto 360 nor in the android wear app on the phone Guys pls reply.... Why am I having this issue
